meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>wicked</kanji> <kanji>devil</kanji>! Ugh, I hate those things. They're always a <vocabulary>hindrance</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>intrusion</vocabulary>. Just imagine a wicked devil hanging out in your house, eating your food, and sleeping on your bed. What a hindrance.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
